sen.j: 裏寺町通（うらでらまちどおり）は京都市の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Uraderamachi-dori Street is one of the south and north street in Kyoto City.
Uraderamachi-dori Street is a street running north-south in Kyoto City.
Uraderamachi-dori Street is a street running north-south in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 六角通の北から四条通までの比較的短い通りである。
sen.e: It is relatively short street which runs from Rokkaku-dori Street at north to Shijo-dori Street.
It is a relatively short street which runs from the northern tip of Rokkaku-dori Street to Shijo-dori Street.
It is a relatively short street which runs from the northern tip of Rokkaku-dori Street to Shijo-dori Street.

sen.j: 豊臣秀吉の京都改造によって、寺町通などと共に作られた通りである。
sen.e: This street was established with Teramachi-dori Street and so on for reorganization of Kyoto by Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI.
This street was established with Teramachi-dori Street and so on during Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI's reorganization of Kyoto.
This street was established with Teramachi-dori Street and so on during Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI's reorganization of Kyoto.

sen.j: 四条道場金蓮寺 (京都市)などの、寺町通沿いの寺院の境内が、縁日の舞台として利用されるようになり、裏寺町通にも見世物小屋や芝居小屋が見られるようになった。
sen.e: The precincts of a temple such as Shijo-dori Konoren-ji Temple (Kyoto City) which was along Teramachi-dori Street was used as a fair booth, so the show tent and small theater started to show up on Uraderamachi-dori Street.

Temple precincts including Shijo-dori Konoren-ji Temple (Kyoto City) which was along Teramachi-dori Street were used as a booth during fairs, causing show tents and small theaters to show up on Uraderamachi-dori Street as well.

Temple precincts including Shijo-dojo Konren-ji Temple (Kyoto City) which was along Teramachi-dori Street were used as a booth during fairs, causing show tents and small theaters to show up on Uraderamachi-dori Street as well.
sen.cmt: 四条道場金蓮寺の表記を修正

sen.j: 明治の中頃には、西隣りに新しくできた新京極通が、繁華街となった。
sen.e: Sinkyogoku-dori street which is next to the street at east became a busy street in the middle of Meiji era.
Sinkyogoku-dori street, which was developed next to Uraderamachi-dori Street on its west side, became a busy street in the middle of the Meiji era.
sen.cmt: Robert: The translator seems to constantly mistranslate simple items like "east," "west," etc/ Edited for flow
sen.e: Sinkyogoku-dori street, which was developed next to Uraderamachi-dori Street on its west side, became a busy street in the middle of the Meiji period.

sen.j: かつては、その名の通りに、繁華街である新京極通の裏道的な通りであり、ショッピングなどに利用されることは稀であった。
sen.e: It used to be a back street of Shinkyogoku-dori Street as seen from the name, so it was rare to use for shopping and so on.
It used to be a back street of Shinkyogoku-dori Street as the name implies, so it was rarely used for shopping and so on.
It used to be a back street of Shinkyogoku-dori Street as the name implies, so it was rarely used for shopping and so on.

sen.j: その転機となったのは、河原町ビブレの開店（1970年10月）と、映画館の京極東宝の改築（1973年7月）である。
sen.e: The turning point was the opening of Kawaramachi Vivre (October, 1970) and the renovation of Kyogoku Toho movie theater (July 1973).
The turning point was the opening of Kawaramachi Vivre (October, 1970) and the renovation of Kyogoku Toho movie theater (July 1973).
The turning point was the opening of Kawaramachi Vivre (October, 1970) and the renovation of Kyogoku Toho movie theater (July 1973).

sen.j: これらの施設によって、新京極通、蛸薬師通からの人の流れが出来た。
sen.e: The stream of people from Shinkyogoku-dori Street and Takoyakushi-dori Street was established by these facilities.
The above facilities helped to establish the population and use of Shinkyogoku-dori Street and Takoyakushi-dori Street.
The above facilities helped to establish the population and use of Shinkyogoku-dori Street and Takoyakushi-dori Street.

sen.j: しかし、それも、映画人口の減少と、マイカルの経営破綻によって、一時期低迷する。
sen.e: But that was in depression for a while from the decrease of the people who likes movie, and bankruptcy of Mycal.
However, for a while, a depression was caused by a decrease in movie goers as well as the bankruptcy of Mycal.
However, for a while, a depression was caused by a decrease in movie goers as well as the bankruptcy of Mycal.

sen.j: それが再び活性化されたのは、河原町OPAの開店（1998年11月）である。
sen.e: The reason for revitalization was the opening of Kawaramachi OPA (November 1998)
Its revitalization was spurred on by the opening of Kawaramachi OPA (November 1998)
Its revitalization was spurred on by the opening of Kawaramachi OPA (November 1998)

sen.j: もちろん、正面玄関は河原町通側に設けられたが、裏寺町通側にも出入口が設けられ、裏寺町通の人の流れの南の起点となった。
sen.e: Of course the main gate was built on Kawaramachi dori side but, also entrance was built on Uraderamachi-dori Street side, so it became a base of south for streaming of people on Uraderamachi-dori Street.

Of course the main gate was built on the Kawaramachi dori side but an entrance was also built on the Uraderamachi-dori Street side, and became a point of origin from which people would flow in from the south to Uraderamachi-dori Street.

Of course the main gate was built on the Kawaramachi-dori Street side but an entrance was also built on the Uraderamachi-dori Street side, and became a point of origin from which people would flow in from the south to Uraderamachi-dori Street.
sen.cmt: 他の表記と合わせ、Kawaramachi-dori Street sideとしました。

sen.j: 六角通から四条通までが、路上喫煙等禁止区域である。
sen.e: From Rokkaku-dori Street to Shijo street is the non smoking area street.
The section between Rokkaku-dori Street to Shijo street is designated as a non smoking area.
The section between Rokkaku-dori Street to Shijo street is designated as a non smoking area.

tit.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更

sen.j: 長仙院
頂源院
大善寺 (京都市)
光明寺
極楽寺
宝蔵寺
法界寺
妙心寺
河原町ビブレ - 現在は京都ロフト (雑貨店)を中心としたテナントが入っている。
sen.e: Kawaramachi Vivre - now it has Kyoto Loft (variety store) as a main tenant.
sen.cmt: 原文全体の訳がないため、新たに訳出しました。

sen.j: 常楽寺
光徳寺
称名寺
西導寺
浄心寺
京極東宝 - 2006年1月29日に閉館。
sen.e: Kyogoku Toho movie theater - closed on January 29, 2006.
sen.cmt: 京極東宝→前出の表記に合わせ、movie theaterをつけました。

sen.j: 河原町OPA

tit.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更

sen.j: 河原町駅 (京都府)（通りの南端）、四条駅 (京阪)、京都市営地下鉄東西線京都市役所前駅
sen.e: Kawaramachi Station (Kyoto Prefecture) (edge of south of the street), Shijo Station (Keihan), Kyoto Shiyakusho-mae Station, Tozai Line of Kyoto City Subway
Kawaramachi Station (Kyoto Prefecture) (south edge of the street), Shijo Station (Keihan), Kyoto Shiyakusho-mae Station, Tozai Line of Kyoto City Subway
